events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position with all required documents submitted.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to relevant software development experience.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process for the software engineer role.
Initial screening call completed successfully and the candidate displayed strong knowledge in software engineering fundamentals.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback expressing enthusiasm and readiness for the technical interview.
The technical interview for the candidate has been scheduled for May 5th. The interview will focus on coding and system design.
